title: Presidential veto rejects all sections of a bill

content.question: In vetoing a bill, the President does which of the following?

choices.label: Rejects only a part of the bill without rejecting it entirely.
Prevents any further action on the bill.
Sends the bill back to conference committee.
Rejects all sections of the bill.

content.answer: Rejects all sections of the bill.

topic.text: 2.2: Structures, Powers, and Functions of Congress

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
